name: DD-Twitter
author: Wouter Dijkstra

sections.description:
This plugin contains the DD-twitter widget. This widget shows a stream of a Twitter-account. To let it work, fill in the correct Twitter-app credentials in the setting-menu.

Inside the widgetform you can set the widget title, the Twitter username, and the total tweets to show.

To use it inside posts or pages use the sortcode.

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload the DD-Twitter directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add key and token to the DD-Twitter settings
  4. Customize the widget
sections.faq: Do you have ideas, questions or issues with DD-Twitter? Please leave a message in the support forum.
